entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 13.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 12:00 PM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 13.0°C

Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 99 %

Wind: SE 46 km/h gust 72 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy becoming mixed with drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of a thundershower this afternoon. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 1 May 2023
